detail_desc: Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and raw-edge sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Harem trousers in jersey with elastication at the waist and hems.

Bikini top in sturdy fabric with lightly padded cups, detachable ties at the back of the neck and a zip at the front. Silicone trim at the back, support below the bust, laser-cut trims at the hem and visible seams.
Fine-knit shaftless yoga socks with anti-slip protectors.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with a metal fastener at the front, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seems. Lined.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and down one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed viscose jersey with overlocked edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Cardigan in soft, garter-stitched cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front.
3/4-length leggings in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, decorative gathers at the top, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft mesh with frill trims, a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Coat in woven fabric with a shawl collar and welt side pockets. Detachable belt with D-rings and a tab with press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short jacket in supple leather with a high, padded stand-up collar with ribbing on the inside and adjustable straps with metal buckles. Zip and concealed press-studs, flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud and side pockets with a concealed press-stud. Zip at the cuffs and a sewn-on, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Lined.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Imitation leather bag with a print motif and appliqués on the front, two handles and a zip at the top. Lined. Size 5x14x20 cm.
Fitted jumper in an airy rib knit with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top, a smocked seam under the bust and smocking at the cuffs.
Imitation leather sandals with butterfly appliqués at the front and a strap with a hook and loop fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic (TPR) rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Ribbed trim around the neckline.
Hipster briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Parka in a woven modal blend with an unlined hood, loose yoke, zip down the front and drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, elasticated cuffs, a drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Unlined.
Jersey tube scarf. Length 40 cm, circumference approx. 56 cm.

Set with a T-shirt and matching joggers in soft fabric. Classic T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a casual style and relaxed fit. Easy pull-on waist with covered elastication and a drawstring. Pockets in the side seams, one back pocket, a low crotch and tapered legs with a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric. Detachable hood with a faux shearling lining and faux fur trim and a zip down the front with a chin guard and wind flap. Chest pockets with a concealed zip and patch front pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Soft faux shearling lining. The polyester content of the parka is partly recycled.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with dropped shoulders and a flounce with an overlocked edge on the sleeves.
Knee-length skirt in a sturdy weave with decorative metal rings at the top, a slit at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Shirt in airy linen with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Knitted top with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow, tie-top shoulder straps.
Long nightshirt in a linen weave with notch lapels and a chest pocket. Buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Socks knitted in a soft, patterned cotton blend with elasticated tops.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and imitation leather details.
Cropped sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral, lined sports bra that has an elasticated hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Long-sleeved top jersey made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Sunglasses with thin metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Top in soft jersey made from a linen and viscose blend with a V-neck, short sleeves and ties at the front of the hem.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width approx. 11.5 cm.
Top in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen, with a small stand-up collar, low dropped shoulders, long dolman sleeves and a drawstring at the sides.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the side and crotch.

Jacket in cotton twill with a small stand-up collar, shoulder tabs and a zip down the front. Chest and front pockets with a flap and press-stud, concealed elastication at the waist and cuffs with an opening and press-stud. Lined.
Boots in satin with a stretchy shaft. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 6.5 cm.

Bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in jersey crêpe with a slight sheen. Square neckline, long puff sleeves and gathers in the side seams for a gently draping effect.
Slightly longer hooded top in soft fleece with appliqués and embroidery. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, fitted dungaree dress in stretch twill with a zip down the front and straps with adjustable metal fasteners. Soft, detachable belt with a metal buckle and a flap front pocket with a button. Unlined.
Playsuit in soft cotton jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam and drawstring at the waist. Short sleeves, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Short jumper in a chunky-knit cotton blend with hole-patterned details. Ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, tapered sleeves.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-neck opening with ties at the top. Long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a skirt with seams. Lined.
Paper straw hat with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 5 cm.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Pyjamas in soft viscose. Jersey top and woven shorts with an elasticated waist and slits at the hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, a print motif on the front and cut-off sleeves with raw, roll edges.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Bikini top with lined cups, removable inserts and narrow shoulder straps that join and tie at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders. Ribbed shorts with a small appliqué at the top, an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Side pockets at the front and welt back pockets with a button. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Sweatshirt in soft, textured pile with narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey vest tops with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems, and press-studs on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with appliqués, a small ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Airy blouse in a modal weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the front and on the shoulders, and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a low neckline and decorative, covered buttons down the front. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Short shirt dress in soft, lightweight viscose twill with a rounded collar, frill-trimmed yoke, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist, a detachable tie belt and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Slides with a large bow at the front, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
